trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE2_00468_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>At the center of the confluence of aether you find more magicite, as before in the observatory. As you kneel to retrieve it, the confluence dissipates...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTSPHERE2_00468_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>The magicite you have obtained may be used in conjunction with your magia board.
